Module atu.aicme4j
Package jhealy.aicme4j.net

Enum Class LayerSize

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Enum<LayerSize>
jhealy.aicme4j.net.LayerSize
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Comparable<LayerSize>, Constable
public enum LayerSize extends Enum<LayerSize>
Enum for the heuristic to use to compute the number of nodes in a hidden layer of a neural network based on the sizes of the input and the output layers.
Since:
Aicme4j 1.0
Author:
Dr. John Healy, ATU.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class java.lang.Enum

    Enum.EnumDesc<E extends Enum<E>>

  • Enum Constant Summary

    Enum Constants
    Enum Constant
    Description
    GEOMETRIC_PYRAMID
    Geometric Pyramid heuristic, h(n, m) = sqrt(n * m)
    GOLDEN_RATIO
    Golden Ratio heuristic, h(n, m) = (n + m) * 1.618033988
    INPUT_IDENTITY
    The number of nodes in the input layer that corresponds with the number of features or data shape, (n, m) = n
    INPUT_PRODUCT
    Double Input heuristic, h(n, m) = n * 2.0
    OUTPUT_IDENTITY
    The number of nodes in the output layer that corresponds with the number of labels or categories, (n, m) = m
    SUM
    Sum of Input and Output heuristic, h(n, m) = n + m
    WEIGHTED_INPUT
    Weighted Input plus Output heuristic, h(n, m) = (n * 0.66) + m

    • get

      public int get(int input, int output)
      Returns the number of nodes to use in the hidden layer of a neural network from a heuristic based on the sizes of the input and output layers.
      Parameters:
      input - the number of nodes in the input layer of the neural network
      output - the number of nodes in the output layer of the neural network
